statements: DELETE FROM in_game_purchases WHERE player_id = '1b9d6bcd-bbfd-4b2d-9b5d-ab8dfbbd4bed' AND purchase_datetime < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM in_game_purchases WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' AND purchase_amount > 50.00;
DELETE FROM in_game_purchases WHERE purchase_id = 100 AND player_id = 500;
DELETE FROM revenue_analysis WHERE revenue_amount > 1000 AND analysis_id IN (SELECT analysis_id FROM in_game_purchases WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM users WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE country = 'USA');
